full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I PHYAG DRUG GTOR CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BYIN BRLABS CAN DU MA YOD BZHIN DU, YAN LAG BRGYAD LDAN GYIS MTSO 'GRAM DU BA TSA'I 'KHRON PA BRGO BA'I DAL BA 'DI 'DRA MI DGOS 'DUG KYANG , RANG GI GAM DU GNAS PA'I MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS, MGON PO'I MNGON RTOGS BSKANG BSHAGS, BZLAS PA, GTOR MA 'BUL, BSTOD BSKUL SOGS CHA TSANG ZHING, TSIG NYING RGYUN 'KHYER DU BYED RGYU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, BSKANG BSHAGS GNYIS RJE BLA MA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS MDZAD PA DANG, BSTOD PA SNYING PA GZHIR BZHAG ,GZHAN RNAMS TSIG SBYOR GSAR @008A *, ,DU BGYIS STE BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SPYIR TSAL YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYAR YI GE PAS YE SHES MGON POS RJES SU 'DZIN PAR GYUR CIG ,)
